content: meet piper the puppy lovey a sweet lovey crochet pattern piper loves cuddle time and just wants a forever home with his favorite little person skill level advanced beginner/intermediate > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size g - fiberfill - tapestry needle yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn blanket shown is approximately 17 at widest point pattern is written in english using standard american terms pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-baby-lovey-puppy/
